content: उपदेशः {@--1@} Instruction, teaching, advice, prescription; सुशिक्षितोपि सर्व उपदेशेन निपुणो भवति <ls>M. 1</ls> (see the act {%inter alia%}); स्थिरोपदेशामुपदेशकाले प्रपेदिरे प्राक्तनजन्मविद्याः <ls>Ku. 1. 30</ls>; अचिरप्रवृत्तोपदेशं नाट्यं <ls>M. 1</ls>, <ls n="M.">2. 10</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 272</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 26</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 57</ls>; <ls>K. 26</ls>; <ls>M. 6</ls>; परोपदेशे पांडित्यं <ls>H. 1. 103.</ls> {@--2@} Pointing out or referring to: शब्दानामितरेतरोपदेशः <ls>Nir.</ls> {@--3@} Specification, mentioning, naming. {@--4@} A plea, pretext. {@--5@} Initiation, communication of an initiatory Mantra or formula; चंद्रसूर्यग्रहे तीर्थे सिद्धक्षेत्रे शिवालये . मंत्रमात्रप्रकथनमुपदेशः स उच्यते ... {@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A form in a rule, an indicatory form; any word or part of a word, such as an affix, augment &c. with its {%anubandhas%} which show what particular grammatical rules are to be applied.
